description: globally unique id for this event
name: id

description: BSON id of the user that converts
name: user_id

description: external user id of the user
name: external_user_id

description: API ID of the app on which this conversion occurred
name: app_id

description: unix timestamp at which the conversion happened
name: time

description: API ID of the message variation
name: message_variation_id

description: message send ID this message belongs to
name: send_id

description: JSON-encoded string describing the conversion behavior
name: conversion_behavior
